title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: April 27, 2023, 12:46:08 PMLast edit: April 30, 2023, 11:03:21 AM by minerjones
content: 2017 Kialara Silver Series "To The Moon" Suite #17#17/21 two bitcoins *error bar - reverse screw heads were not milled out*#17/100 500,000 bits#17/250 200,000 bits*Bars come with original plastic bag/sticker and official Kialara plastic caseSTARTING BID: 0.350BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 3 decimal places**END TIME: MAY 2nd, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Incredible suite, can't remember the last time I saw a full set on offer.Out of my league, but seemsÂ  very reasonable for this unique limited to 21 set.

comments.body: ðŸ”¥I remember waiting like a year for these back in the day lol... at least we got some free error coins! Ref: https://kialara.com/product/silver-series-2017-moon/

comments.author: Humble Bitcoiners
comments.body: Seems to be an "Error Suite". The 2 Bitcoin bar isn't milled on back

comments.author: CoinageMint
comments.body: Quote from: Humble Bitcoiners on April 30, 2023, 06:37:24 AMSeems to be an "Error Suite". The 2 Bitcoin bar isn't milled on backWell spotted, This does look like an error, the pics on the site show the screw milled

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: CoinageMint on April 30, 2023, 08:27:09 AMQuote from: Humble Bitcoiners on April 30, 2023, 06:37:24 AMSeems to be an "Error Suite". The 2 Bitcoin bar isn't milled on backWell spotted, This does look like an error, the pics on the site show the screw milledThis has been added to the OP Any bids for this error suite?

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Ends in about 22.5 hours!!Don't miss out on this exclusive "error" Moon Suite

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Ended with no bidsIf interested in this, please PM me

comments.author: Kialara
comments.body: I connected with the owner of this suite and the 2BTC denominated bar is on its way to me via minerjones. I plan to complete the piece and ship the bar back to MJ to be re-auctioned (as a suite) with a 0.01 starting bid and no reserve. I didn't want this unfinished bar being in circulation, so I negotiated a deal with its owner that they were in agreement with. Back in the day I had a system where I would drill out the heads (final step) and pass the pieces off to an assistant who would clean and pack them. I obviously missed the one side and it wasn't noticed by my assistant either.
